summary: This bill, the Billion Dollar Boondoggle Act of 2025, mandates an annual report on taxpayer-funded projects exceeding budget and schedule.  The Director of the Office of Management and Budget will collect information from covered agencies (Executive and independent regulatory agencies) regarding projects that are significantly delayed or over budget by $1,000,000,000.  The report, submitted to Congress and posted online, will include project details, cost and schedule comparisons, explanations for delays and cost overruns, and details of any bonuses paid to workers. The goal is to increase transparency in government spending.
